channel.title: Teaching on Johnny's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Teaching on Johnny's Blog

item.title: Rapid analysis of student-teacher ratios worldwide
item.description: Introduction In this segment we perform a brief analysis of data on student-teacher ratios across countries worldwide - the data is from the tidytuesday segment on github. Limited by time constraints and actuarial exams, this is a relatively short post; however, it showcases some of the functional tools you can use in purrr to make your code more powerful. Data import Letâ€™s first read in the data from the github repo:
